original: intros fact_neq_0 p n H. revert p H. induction n as [|n' IHn]. - intros. simpl. assert (p = 0) as Hp0. lia. rewrite Hp0. simpl. auto. - intros p H. destruct p as [|p']. + rewrite Nat.mul_1_r. simpl. rewrite Nat.mul_1_r. auto. + simpl. rewrite Nat.mul_succ_r. rewrite Nat.mul_succ_l. rewrite IHn. * rewrite <- Nat.sub_succ_l. reflexivity. lia. * lia.
